Title: SIB pledges Rs.1 crore to Kochi biennale
Content: Just about four months to go for the third edition of the Kochi Muziris Biennale to get under way, the South Indian Bank (SIB) has pledged Rs.1 crore from its CSR fund for the pioneering art initiativ
Author: Special Correspondent
Description: Just about four months to go for the third edition of the Kochi Muziris Biennale to get under way, the South Indian Bank (SIB) has pledged Rs.1 crore from its CSR fund for the pioneering art initiativ
